mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_RES_USETECHNIQUEINFOS.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RES_USETECHNIQUEINFOS (TID,TECHNAME,TECHTEXT,INDEXNO,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME) VALUES (#{tid},#{techname},#{techtext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{indexno},#{extensionfield1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectname})

select CONCAT('LC',substr('000'||cast(substr(MAX(CATALOGID),3,4)+1 as varchar2(10)),length('000'||cast(substr(MAX(CATALOGID),3,4)+1 as varchar2(10)))-4+1,4)) from RESUDP_CATALOGS
insert into RESUDP_CATALOGS(CATALOGID,CATALOGNAME,FULLCATALOGNAME,PARENTCATALOGID,INPARENTINDEXNO,LEVELNAME,NODETYPE,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME) values(#{catalogid},#{catalogname},#{fullcatalogname},#{parentcatalogid},#{inparentindexno},#{levelname},#{nodetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectname})
mapper.update: UPDATE RESUDP_CATALOGS A SET A.PARENTCATALOGID=(SELECT C.CATALOGID FROM (SELECT CATALOGID,SUBSTR(FULLCATALOGNAME,0,LENGTH(FULLCATALOGNAME)-LENGTH(CATALOGNAME)-1) AS F From RESUDP_CATALOGS) B, RESUDP_CATALOGS C WHERE A.CATALOGID=B.CATALOGID AND B.F=C.FULLCATALOGNAME)
UPDATE RESUDP_CATALOGS SET PARENTCATALOGID='NONE' WHERE (PARENTCATALOGID IS NULL OR LENGTH(PARENTCATALOGID)=0)
mapper.insert:
select CONCAT('LC',substr('0000'||cast(substr(MAX(CATALOGNODEID),3,5)+1 as varchar2(10)),length('0000'||cast(substr(MAX(CATALOGNODEID),3,5)+1 as varchar2(10)))-5+1,5)) from RESUDP_CATALOGFULLTREE
insert into RESUDP_CATALOGFULLTREE(CATALOGNODEID,CATALOGNODENAME,CATALOGID,NODETYPE,VIEWRESOURCE,EDITRESOURCE,SAVERESOURCE,TRANSMITRESOURCE,CANCATALOGSEARCH,CANFULLTEXTSEARCH,FULLTEXTSEARCHRESOURCE,CANSHOWEXTENSIONS,INDEXNO,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME) values(#{catalognodeid},#{catalognodename},#{catalogid},#{nodetype},#{viewresource},#{editresource},#{saveresource},#{transmitresource},#{cancatalogsearch},#{canfulltextsearch},#{fulltextsearchresource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{canshowextensions},#{indexno},#{extensionfield1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectname})

select CONCAT('RD',substr('00000'||cast(substr(MAX(DOCUMENTID),3,6)+1 as varchar2(10)),length('00000'||cast(substr(MAX(DOCUMENTID),3,6)+1 as varchar2(10)))-6+1,6)) from RESUDP_DOCUMENTINFOS
insert into RESUDP_DOCUMENTINFOS(DOCUMENTID,TITLE,CREATOR,SUBJECT,DESCRIPTION,PUBLISHER,CONTRIBUTOR,DOCUMENTDATE,TYPE,FORMAT,SOURCE,IDENTIFIER,LANGUAGE,RELATION,COVERAGE,RIGHTS,MD5,VERSION,LOCATION,FILEEXTENSION,DELETESTATUS,PROJECTNAME) values(#{documentid},#{title},#{creator},#{subject},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{publisher},#{contributor},#{documentdate},#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{format},#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{language},#{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{coverage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rights}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{version},'Resource\'||#{documentid},#{fileextension},#{deletestatus},#{projectname})

select CONCAT('SD',substr('00000'||cast(substr(MAX(DOCUMENTID),3,6)+1 as varchar2(10)),length('00000'||cast(substr(MAX(DOCUMENTID),3,6)+1 as varchar2(10)))-6+1,6)) from RESUDP_SYSTEMINFOS
insert into RESUDP_SYSTEMINFOS(DOCUMENTID,TITLE,CREATOR,SUBJECT,DESCRIPTION,PUBLISHER,CONTRIBUTOR,DOCUMENTDATE,TYPE,FORMAT,SOURCE,IDENTIFIER,LANGUAGE,RELATION,COVERAGE,RIGHTS,MD5,VERSION,LOCATION,FILEEXTENSION,DELETESTATUS,PROJECTNAME) values(#{documentid},#{title},#{creator},#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{publisher},#{contributor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{documentdate},#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{format},#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{language},#{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{coverage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rights},#{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{version},#{documentid},#{fileextension},#{deletestatus},#{projectname})

select CONCAT('LQ',substr('000000'||cast(substr(nvl(MAX(QUESTIONID),'LQ0000000'),3,7)+1 as varchar2(10)),length('000000'||cast(substr(MAX(QUESTIONID),3,7)+1 as varchar2(10)))-7+1,7)) from RESUDP_QUESTIONS
insert into RESUDP_QUESTIONS(QUESTIONID,SUBJECT,TITLE,DESCRIPTION,ANSWER,REFERENCENOTES,EXAMPLE,INTERPRETATION,NOTES,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME) values(#{questionid},#{subject},#{title},#{description},#{answer},#{referencenotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{example},#{interpretation},#{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectname})

SELECT SEQ_RESUDP_QUESTIONLAWREFS.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RESUDP_QUESTIONLAWREFS (TID,QUESTIONID,DOCUMENTID,DOCUMENTNAME,ENTITYNO,DESCRIPTION,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME) VALUES (#{tid},#{questionid},#{documentid},#{documentname},#{entityno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extensionfield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectname})

SELECT SEQ_RESUDP_QUESTIONEXAMPLES.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RESUDP_QUESTIONEXAMPLES (TID,QUESTIONID,CATALOGNODEID,CATALOGNODENAME,NODETYPE,PROJECTNAME) VALUES (#{tid},#{questionid},#{catalognodeid},#{catalognodename},#{nodetype},#{projectname})

SELECT CONCAT('EI',TO_CHAR(CAST(SUBSTR(NVL(MAX(EXAMPLEID),'EI0000000'),3,7)+1 AS VARCHAR2(10)),'FM0000000')) FROM RESUDP_LAWEXAMPLES
insert into RESUDP_LAWEXAMPLES(EXAMPLEID,SUBJECT,TITLE,EXAMPLE,INTERPRETATION,NOTES,PROJECTNAME) values(#{exampleid},#{subject},#{title},#{example},#{interpretation},#{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectname})

INSERT INTO RES_CATALOGFULLTREE SELECT CATALOGNODEID,CATALOGNODENAME,CATALOGID,NODETYPE,VIEWRESOURCE,EDITRESOURCE,SAVERESOURCE,TRANSMITRESOURCE,CANCATALOGSEARCH,CANFULLTEXTSEARCH,FULLTEXTSEARCHRESOURCE,CANSHOWEXTENSIONS,INDEXNO,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME FROM RESUDP_CATALOGFULLTREE
INSERT INTO RES_CATALOGS SELECT CATALOGID,CATALOGNAME,FULLCATALOGNAME,PARENTCATALOGID,INPARENTINDEXNO,LEVELNAME,NODETYPE,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME FROM RESUDP_CATALOGS

INSERT INTO SYS_DOCUMENTINFOS SELECT DOCUMENTID,TITLE,CREATOR,SUBJECT,DESCRIPTION,PUBLISHER,CONTRIBUTOR,DOCUMENTDATE,TYPE,FORMAT,SOURCE,IDENTIFIER,LANGUAGE,RELATION,COVERAGE,RIGHTS,MD5,VERSION,LOCATION,FILEEXTENSION,DELETESTATUS,PROJECTNAME FROM RESUDP_DOCUMENTINFOS
INSERT INTO RES_QUESTIONLAWREFS SELECT TID,QUESTIONID,DOCUMENTID,DOCUMENTNAME,ENTITYNO,DESCRIPTION,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME FROM RESUDP_QUESTIONLAWREFS
INSERT INTO RES_QUESTIONS SELECT QUESTIONID,SUBJECT,TITLE,DESCRIPTION,ANSWER,REFERENCENOTES,EXAMPLE,INTERPRETATION,NOTES,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2,PROJECTNAME FROM RESUDP_QUESTIONS

INSERT INTO SYS_SYSTEMINFOS SELECT DOCUMENTID,TITLE,CREATOR,SUBJECT,DESCRIPTION,PUBLISHER,CONTRIBUTOR,DOCUMENTDATE,TYPE,FORMAT,IDENTIFIER,SOURCE,LANGUAGE,RELATION,COVERAGE,RIGHTS,MD5,VERSION,PROJECTNAME,LOCATION,FILEEXTENSION,DELETESTATUS,EXTENSIONFIELD1,EXTENSIONFIELD2 FROM RESUDP_SYSTEMINFOS
INSERT INTO RES_QUESTIONEXAMPLES SELECT TID,QUESTIONID,CATALOGNODEID,CATALOGNODENAME,NODETYPE,PROJECTNAME FROM RESUDP_QUESTIONEXAMPLES
INSERT INTO RES_LAWEXAMPLES SELECT EXAMPLEID,SUBJECT,TITLE,EXAMPLE,INTERPRETATION,NOTES,PROJECTNAME FROM RESUDP_LAWEXAMPLES
